dict.acceptation: 乘出租车；（指飞机）在地面或水面滑行；

sent.orig: If there is no meter in the taxi, agree on a price before you get in.
sent.trans: 把这句话中的taxi和price联系在一起综合考虑，我们可以推侧出meter意思是“计价器”。

sent.orig: Here's a taxi-rank. We'd better take a taxi.
sent.trans: 这儿是出租汽车招呼站。我们最好还是坐出租汽车。

sent.orig: Taxi call boxes would be located at taxi stands, where taxis would queue for trips.
sent.trans: 出租车联络箱位于其停车处，在那里出租车排好队，等候上路。

sent.orig: How does Mr. Wang drive his taxi? He drives his taxi carefully.
sent.trans: 王先生怎样驾驶他的计程车？他小心地驾驶他的计程车。

sent.orig: Cleared to taxi out follow central taxi strip.
sent.trans: 可以沿中央联络道滑出。
